feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Manage Safety Instructions for Equipment in Cloud Public Edition
entry.content:
In application Manage Safety Instructions for Equipment(F4425) I can't find any Location or Equipment. 

I have managed Locations in App Manage Locations and Created a location with technical object reference and also Imported location from PM. 

For example in App Manage Risk Assessments, Locations and equipment works fine.

I have right roles assigned, integration with PM is activated.

What may be the issue?

entry.title: Missing Documents in My Inbox
entry.content:
Good day, 

I am having issues with approval process. I have checked all the requirements in terms of business roles and business catalogs of the users. But there are documents where it would not notify the approver and would not appear in the My Inbox app.

(1) When I check the document, the status is "In Approval" and in the approval details section of the item it says "Ready", but it did not notify the approver, and it didn't appear in the My Inbox app. 

(2) There are also times when the documents that were sent for approval would disappear in the My Inbox if not processed immediately. 

May I know the possible reason for this and the solution for the issues.

entry.title: IBAN Validation Error: “Account number xxxx in the IBAN is incorrect”
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

We are facing an issue in S/4HANA (Vendor Master / BP – Vendor role) while maintaining bank details for vendors.

Error message: “Account number … in the IBAN is incorrect”

However, the IBAN entered is correct and verified.

Additionally, the system also displays : “Account checksum is not checked”

The checkbox for bank data is active in FI, and the bank account check works correctly for thousands of vendors. This issue has occurred for two different vendors, so it does not appear to be a one-off data entry problem.

Solution proposed:  Deactivate the "Bank Data" checkbox and skipping the validation. 

However, are there alternatives?

Thanks

entry.title: CREATION OF TRANSFER ORDER FROM A PROJECT DEMAND
entry.content:
Greetings,

Please Is there a way when a project demand is created for a material, an availability check is done on the material in other storage locations and if available, a transfer order is created, if not available, a purchase order is created.

 

best regards

entry.title: Exporting PIRs from MD62/MD63 to Exce
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I’m trying to export the PIRs from MD62/MD63 to an Excel file, but I haven’t found a way to do it yet. I have already tried using transaction MD79, but the issue is that it only allows exporting one material at a time. There’s no option to select multiple materials or an entire product family.

Is there a way to export all PIRs at once to Excel?

Thank you in advance for your help!

entry.title: PR Re-Approval After Deletion
entry.content:
Dear All,

In flexible workflow, In the case where a Purchase Requisition (PR) has already been approved, is it possible to cancel it by deleting the PR item and have the system trigger the approval workflow again?

Regards,

Keratiya D.

entry.title: Down payment paid in legacy system SAP S4HANA cloud
entry.content:
Hi All,

I would like to ask for suggestions in case of migrating supplier/vendor down payments to SAP S4HANA cloud. In terms of SAP S4HANA cloud, vendor down payments as special GL indicator items are not supported in migration cockpit app, which means that they can not be migrated and have to be entered manually. I have found two approaches on how to get these items into S4 depending on whether the advance payment was already made in legacy system or it will be posted in new system (S4).

1. If no payment is present in legacy system the process is to:

-post the vendor down payment request in S4

-book payment in S4

-after invoice is posted, clear both in S4

 

2. now if the payment is already posted in legacy system the workaround might be to reclassify the supplier down payment as vendor credit memo to be able to clear this item with final invoice once it is posted in S4. 

 

Does anyone have an experience with option 2? What is the best practice in such a case? Is the described workaround valid?

Thanks in advance for your help

Zuzana Gersiova

entry.title: Automate MIRO process
entry.content:
We would like to implement functionality to automatically post MIRO (Invoice Verification) entries based on corresponding MIGO (Goods Receipt) entries, ensuring seamless linkage between goods receipt and invoice processing. Please suggest if there is any solution provided by SAP for this requirement in public cloud.

entry.title: BMH - 'Create Stock Transport' button with retail sites
entry.content:
Dear community,

I am currently working in a retail environnement and am searching how I can use the functionality offered by scope item BMH to create a stock transport order (STO) directly from the app F1957 Transfer Stock Cross Plant as explained in note: https://me.sap.com/notes/2891646

Given that I am working with sites and not plants, I can not fullfil the following prerequisites:

- The issuing plant must have a Customer Assigned to it.  (SSCUI 101926 - Define Shipping Data for Plants)
- The receiving plant must have a default Purchasing Organisation (SSCUI 103865 - Assign Standard Purchase Organisation to plant)  

Is there a way to use this functionnality with retail sites?

Thank you,

entry.title: Matching SAP S/4HANA Cloud user logins with SAP Analytics Cloud (SAC) user logins for live data conn
entry.content:
Dear Sir/Madam,

I am attempting to achieve a live connection between SAC and S4HANA Cloud.

I am following the procedure laid out in the following link: https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_ANALYTICS_CLOUD/00f68c2e08b941f081002fd3691d86a7/3651184dad944aa2b361ad029a7a8cae.html

In the prerequisites section, it is indicated that SAML Single Sign-On must be enabled in SAP Analytics Cloud to authenticate users. Within the customer's environment, there is an existing custom identity provider. However, what the customer prefers is a match between SAP S4HANA Cloud user logins with SAP Analytics Cloud user logins.

Please confirm which authentication method supports this? If so, please advise on how to achieve or accomplish the matching and other considerations?

entry.title: Customer groups not availbale in Manage Allocation app
entry.content: In Manage Allocation app, in Margin Analysis context (Allocation, Distribution and Top Down), when using customer characteristic, no customer group appear, even though they are created and activated from the app Manage Global Hierarchies, both types (Customer Hierarchy - Analytics and Customer Hierarchy - Sales). I understand that it si due to the fact that no "Use in Compatible Group" flag has been enabled. How can we create customer groups to be consumed in Manage Allocation app?

entry.title: Perform Maintenance Job without assigned technician, confirm job against Work Center.
entry.content:
Dear experts,

I am trying to perform a time confirmation against a job (maintenance operation) without assigning a Technician, in the system the feature to assign a Worker (BP) to a SAP User is active and working, still, in this case it is required to make time confirmations at Work center Level instead of using a Technician.

I have define the Control Parameters for Perform Maintenance Jobs, indicating the Confirmation of jobs without assignment, still, the system does not allow to confirm without assignation.

My system version is SAP S/4HANA CLOUD 2508, 

Would it be possible to do time confirmation of an order operation against a Work Center instead of a technician?

Thank you in advance for your help,

Best Regards

entry.title: Missing Field - Manage Supplier Line Items App
entry.content:
Hello,

On the manage supplier line items app, I need to display the check number field. I know that there is clearing document field available by standard ways but it's imperative for the business to also see the check number linked with the clearing document in the manage supplier line items app.

We don't intend to route through the custom approach for this basic requirement. Looking forward to the suggestions to meet this requirement in standard ways.

BR,
Mohit.

entry.title: Company Logo Not Displayed in Payment Advice Email Template
entry.content:
Hellor,

In the “Maintain Email Templates” application in SAP Public Cloud, I have created an email body template for payment advice notifications. The email text is displayed correctly, but the company logo does not appear when the message is sent to an external email address.

The client provided us with the logo, but it is not published on any public website. When I use the image link, SAP displays it correctly within the system, but the logo is not shown in the outgoing email. The HTML code I am using is the following:

<div style="float:left;width:25%">
<img style="width:50%" src="https://my418744.s4hana.cloud.sap/sap/opu/odata/sap/APS_OM_LOGO_SRV/ImageSet(Name='YY1_LOGOBIOWASTE')/$value">
</div>

Does anyone know if there is a way to make the logo visible in the email even though it is not publicly available on the internet?

Thank you very much and kind regards.

entry.title: KW407: No prices could be determined for Activity Type SV01 in SAP S/4HANA Cloud (Public Edition)
entry.content:
Hello Experts,

I am facing error KW407 in SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public edition:

“No prices could be determined for object Activity type A000/10301101/SV01
(price indicator 3, value type 1).”

System details:
- Controlling Area: A000
- Cost Center: 10301101
- Activity Type: SV01
- Cost Center Category: C (Professional Service)

What has been done:
- KP26 is not available (Public Cloud)
- Planned costs uploaded via Import Financial Plan Data (Cost Center Planning)
- Planned activity quantities uploaded via Service Planning
- Planning Category = PLN
- Fiscal year matches costing year
- Valuation variant uses planned activity prices

Pricing context:
- Service pricing currently uses Fixed Amount (DRV1)

Despite the above, costing still fails with KW407.

My questions:

  1. Are there any additional prerequisites for activity price determination in S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition?

  2. Are there known restrictions where planned activity prices are not read during costing?

Any guidance or references would be appreciated.

Thank you.

entry.title: S/4HANA Public Cloud – Extensibility for Supplier Rebates (2R7) Business Volume Selection Criteria
entry.content:
Hi SAP Community,

I’m working with SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud (scope item 2R7 – Supplier Rebates / Condition Contracts) and need guidance on extensibility options for Business Volume Selection Criteria.

Requirement

  1. Our customer wants to drive rebate eligibility/rates based on a field that exists in Product (Material) Master as a custom field (created via in-app extensibility).
  2. Conceptually, they want this field available for:
    1. Business Volume Selection Criteria (field / field combination), so the agreement can filter volumes based on that attribute (in addition to standard fields like supplier/material/material group, etc.) Material Group is already in use for another filter.

Questions

  1. In Public Cloud, is it possible to extend Business Volume Selection Criteria (add new fields or new field combinations) for supplier rebates / condition contracts?
  2. If the answer is “not directly”, is there any supported way to implement custom logic to read Product Master custom fields during business volume determination?
  3. For example via BAdI, enhancement spot, or another officially supported extensibility option that can influence the business volume selection/determination.
  4. If there is no supported extension for this, what is the recommended standard approach (mapping the attribute to an available standard field like product hierarchy/material group, or restructuring master data/pricing logic) while staying within clean-core principles?

Thanks,

Ezequiel

entry.title: C_IEE2E vs. TS410: Is this the new standard for S/4HANA or a legacy "Business Suite" exam?
entry.content:
I am planning to specialize in SAP S/4HANA and am currently looking at the C_IEE2E certification (SAP Certified: Implementation Consultant - End-to-End Business Processes).

I am confused by the terminology and want to ensure I don't study for an outdated version:

  1. The description I received references "SAP Business Suite," which usually implies the legacy ECC environment.

  2. However, I see online that C_IEE2E is intended to replace the TS410 (Integrated Business Processes in S/4HANA) certification.

My Question: Has anyone taken the C_IEE2E recently? Is this strictly for SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, and is it now the preferred entry-level certification over the retiring TS410?

I want to ensure my certification path is aligned with the latest S/4HANA innovations, not legacy processes.

Thanks for the guidance!

entry.title: About task Create Project Schedule and Budget n the implementation of S/4 Hana Cloud Public edition
entry.content:
Why is there a task in the SAP S/4HANA Public Edition implementation roadmap, in the Prepare phase, indicating that a project schedule should be created? See task: https://me.sap.com/roadmapviewer/group/658F507A-D6F5-4B78-9EE1-0300C5F1E40F/roadmap/82b2db84548d41209cda972f0fac428b:FA163ED752201EDABFE83D133CFCBD51/node/FA163ED752201EDABFE83D2925E61D51link

If I understand correctly, with the management of the implementation in Cloud ALM, creating the project, selecting the roadmap, and defining the timeline by phase essentially builds the project schedule in ALM. Why create an additional schedule, or what is the purpose of this task?

entry.title: Confirming quantities with a handheld device in SAP HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello.

I have the following client activity, which is to automate the materials receiving process.

They currently use a handheld device to scan the barcodes on the boxes. As each barcode is scanned, the quantity column increases.

Is this functionality available in SAP HANA Public Cloud?

Could you please share documentation on how to implement this process using the handheld device?

Attached is an image of the two apps where we manually entered the quantity.
What's required is to use the handheld device to automatically enter the quantity with each gunshot.

 

 

I look forward to your feedback.

Thank you very much.

entry.title: Create Custom Role for cost center apps
entry.content:
Hi,
We want to build a custom role out of  SAP_BR_OVERHEAD_ACCOUNTANT, to keep below apps only.


Cost Centers - Plan/Actual  || SAP_FIN_BC_OH_REP_CCA_PC

Cost Centers - Actuals  || SAP_FIN_BC_OH_REP_CCA_PC

Cost Centers - Review Booklet  || SAP_FIN_BC_OH_REP_CCA_PC


Is it possible on those Cost Center reporting apps to only give access to certain Cost Centers for each user. For example, for Cost Center Owner DIGITS - Plant Construction D, where a user X is the Cost Center Owner....Can I setup a Business Role for that person where they can only see their Cost Center data when they run those 3 apps?

Please suggest.

regards
